item.description:
On Tuesday, August 23, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present "Disproofs of a God Who Answers Prayers," an open discussion of recent arguments, based in part on Scott Davison, “Petitionary Prayer,” in M. Rea & T. Flint (eds.), The Oxford Handbook of Philosophical Theology (2009), pp. 286-305. Location: Rm. 442 of the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public.

For more information, write to DASociety@aol.com.

Of potential interest, is a new Facebook group called Disproof Atheism, devoted solely to the discussion of such philosophical issues. Online at http://www.facebook.com/home.php#!/groups/190893707639913.
item.name: The Disproof Atheism Society presents "Disproofs of a God Who Answers Prayers"
